comment: A walk as word corresponds to a walk in a pseudograph. This variant of ~ wlkiswwlks does not require ` G ` to be a simple pseudograph, but it requires (indirectly) the Axiom of Choice for its proof. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 21-Jul-2018.) (Revised by AV, 10-Apr-2021.)
